examples: without their support he'll be ruling in a vacuum

definitions.text: clear (a room, house, place) of occupants or empty or clear (a place or receptacle) of something
examples: The chemist voided the glass bottle
The concert hall was voided of the audience

definitions.text: take away the legal force of or render ineffective
excrete or discharge from the body
lacking any legal or binding force

examples: the earth was without form, and void
